title: Hour 3 - Trailblazers for Sale, NBA Finals, John Canzano
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Trailblazers for Sale, NBA Finals, John Canzano
description:
Dan recaps the highlights from last night's Game 1 of the NBA Finals and sits down with Portland insider John Canzano about the offer to buy the Trailblazers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
